name: Develandoo
tagline: We use AI to make this world a better place
description:
Develandoo is an Artificial Intelligence Innovation Lab, specialized in building early-stage companies.
In our Innovation Team as a Service model, we work hand in hand with your existing team to roadmap the AI and the Data Strategy of your organization. We care about your time and want to validate the roadmap first, and the natural next step would be creating a prototype for you which provides a certain percentage of AI accuracy. We will build a complete Minimum Viable AI Product for you so that you can go to market as fast as possible and generate revenue.
We have built startups in the following areas:
1. Security2. Banking3. Automotive4. Cybersecurity5. Healthcare 
Learn more at Develandoo
